requirements.summary: Build a responsive single-page Discademia marketing site with a consistent professional blue-and-white theme and real English copy.
acceptanceCriteria: Site renders as a cohesive, professional blue-and-white theme (primary blue, white backgrounds, accessible contrast).
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
No user-facing text uses placeholder/lorem ipsum; all copy is in English.

file_operations.description: Create the main single-page marketing layout (sections + shared layout primitives) and apply consistent blue/white styling with Tailwind utility classes.
Define global blue-and-white theme tokens (CSS variables used by Tailwind config), typography defaults, focus rings, and smooth scrolling for anchor navigation.
Ensure document metadata supports the marketing site (title already Discademia; confirm language/viewport remain appropriate).

requirements.summary: Add a top navigation header with Discademia branding and anchor links to Intro, 1:1 Tutoring, Faculty, Notes & Mark Schemes, and Live Sessions; ensure mobile-friendly behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Header is visible at the top and works on mobile (collapsed menu or stacked links).
Clicking each nav item scrolls to the correct section on the page.
Active/hover styles match the blue/white professional theme.

file_operations.description: Implement a responsive sticky header with brand (logo + Discademia) and anchor navigation, including a mobile toggle menu and themed hover/focus states.
Wire the SiteHeader into the page and ensure each required section has a matching anchor id for scroll navigation.

requirements.summary: Implement the Welcome/Intro hero section with headline, supporting paragraph, and a primary CTA button with accessible interaction styles.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero includes: headline, supporting text, and at least one CTA button.
Copy is inviting and professional, explicitly referencing O/A Level tutoring.
CTA button has clear hover/focus styles and is keyboard accessible.

file_operations.description: Create the Welcome/Intro hero section with professional O/A Level-focused copy, a primary CTA button, and space for the hero illustration.
Add the HeroSection at the top of the single-page flow and ensure its anchor id matches the header nav link.

requirements.summary: Add a 1:1 Tutoring Classes section with scannable benefits/process content and navigation anchor support.
acceptanceCriteria: Section has a clear title “1:1 Tutoring Classes” (or equivalent) and concise descriptive copy.
Benefits/process are presented in a scannable format (e.g., 3–6 cards or bullet points).
Section is reachable from the top navigation anchor link.

file_operations.description: Create a scannable 1:1 Tutoring Classes section using cards or bullet lists with general (non-specific) coverage language and clear student benefits.
Render the TutoringSection in the correct order and add the required anchor id for header navigation.

requirements.summary: Add an Introducing Faculty section with a responsive grid of profile cards and professional, non-fictional (sample-labeled) content.
acceptanceCriteria: Faculty section displays a responsive card grid with consistent spacing and styling.
Each card includes: name, role/specialty, and short bio text.
Content avoids making unverifiable claims; if placeholders are used, they are clearly indicated as sample profiles.

file_operations.description: Implement a responsive faculty profile grid (3–6 cards) with clearly labeled sample names/roles/bios and conservative, professional wording.
Render the FacultySection and ensure it is reachable via the header anchor link with the correct section id.

requirements.summary: Add a Notes & Mark Schemes section describing resources in a structured (cards) layout and connect it to navigation anchors.
acceptanceCriteria: Section includes a clear title and short explanatory copy.
Section uses a structured layout (e.g., 2–4 feature cards) to communicate what’s included.
Section is reachable from the top navigation anchor link.

file_operations.description: Create the Notes & Mark Schemes section with 2–4 feature cards describing general availability, usage, and support (no upload/download functionality).
Render the NotesSection and add/confirm the matching anchor id used by the header navigation.

requirements.summary: Add a Live Sessions section with a scannable layout describing interactive session expectations and how to join (marketing-only).
acceptanceCriteria: Section includes a clear title and professional, student-focused description.
Section visually matches the theme and uses a scannable layout (cards/bullets).
Section is reachable from the top navigation anchor link.

file_operations.description: Create the Live Sessions section using cards/bullets for Q&A, exam practice, and revision expectations with general guidance on how students can join (no integrations).
Render the LiveSessionsSection and ensure it has the correct anchor id for header navigation.

requirements.summary: Add a footer with Discademia branding, a short tagline, and non-functional contact placeholders consistent with the theme.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all screen sizes and matches the overall styling.
Footer contains at least: brand name, short tagline, and contact placeholders (non-functional is acceptable).

file_operations.description: Implement a responsive footer with Discademia branding, an O/A Level tutoring tagline, and simple contact placeholders (e.g., email/social text links) without external services.
Wire the SiteFooter at the bottom of the single-page layout and ensure theme consistency with the rest of the page.

requirements.summary: Add required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and render logo (header/footer) and hero illustration (intro) responsively.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Discademia logo is displayed in the header and footer.
Hero illustration is displayed in the welcome/intro section and scales responsively without distortion.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/discademia-logo.dim_512x512.png for use as the Discademia logo.
Add the generated static image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/discademia-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png for use in the hero section.
Render the Discademia logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/discademia-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header with appropriate sizing and accessible alt text.
Render the Discademia logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/discademia-logo.dim_512x512.png in the footer with appropriate sizing and accessible alt text.
Render the hero illustration from frontend/public/assets/generated/discademia-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png in a responsive container (preserve aspect ratio; no distortion).
